organization.name: United Hatzalah
organization.description: United Hatzalah is Israel's largest independent, non-profit, fully volunteer emergency medical service organization. With a network of over 6,000 volunteer medics throughout Israel, United Hatzalah provides fast and free emergency medical first response services, reaching patients in under 3 minutes across the country. Their mission is to save lives regardless of race, religion, or national origin.
